title: nijamaithE mundhara
sahitya:
nijamaitE mundara nilavu mIvELa



anupallavi



 ajuDaina harihayuDaina nA bhaktiyu



caraNam 1



 gAsi jenducu nEnu garbhamulO nuNDa dEshika varudupadEshincina della

   

caraNam 2



 unnatamuna nuNDi pada drOsina vELa urvi dEvi nanneTTi bOcina della

   

caraNam 3



 nAga nAgamulu nanu bAdhincaga tyAgarAja nutuDu nannu gAcina della
